Uses of Interface
oracle.ucp.AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback

Packages that use AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback
oracle.ucp Includes both required and optional callback interfaces that are used to implement connection pool features. 
oracle.ucp.jdbc Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool. 

 

Uses of AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback in oracle.ucp

 

Methods in oracle.ucp that return AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback
 AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback UniversalPooledConnection.getAbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback()
          Obtains the AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback registered with this connection.

 

Methods in oracle.ucp with parameters of type AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback
 void UniversalPooledConnection.registerAbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback(AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback cbk)
          Registers an AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback with this connection.

 

Uses of AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback in oracle.ucp.jdbc

 

Methods in oracle.ucp.jdbc with parameters of type AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback
 void ConnectionWithAbandonedTimeout.registerAbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback(AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback cbk)
          Registers AbandonedConnectionTimeoutCallback with this connection.
